turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm calling about a claim I filed last week, claim number is 20231027-458B. I still haven't heard anything and frankly, I'm getting a bit frustrated. It's been a week already!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for calling. I understand your frustration. Let me pull up claim 20231027-458B. Okay, I see it here. The claim is currently under review by our assessment team. It looks like they requested some additional documentation regarding the incident. Did you receive that request?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I did, and I uploaded everything they asked for on the website! The police report, photos of the damage, everything. Why is it still 'under review'? What exactly are they looking for? Is there a specific holdup?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the delay. While I don't have specific details on the holdup, I can see that the documentation is attached to the claim. I will send a message to the assessment team requesting an update and an explanation for the continued review. You should receive a response within 24-48 business hours. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
